subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r22342 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0_25/source:
	include nsswitch
body:
Sorry to jump in here, one thing I'd like to see in idmap_ad is support
for using the Global Catalog. Shouldn't be too hard. Thoughts?

-- Luke

>From: simo 
>Subject: Re: svn commit: samba r22342 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0_25/source: include nsswitch
>To: samba-technical@lists.samba.org
>Date: Thu, 19 Apr 2007 08:37:23 -0400
>Organization: Samba Team
>
>I tested idmap_ad yesterday, while online there is no problem I could
>get into. In offline mode I fond a segfault deep in the ad connection
>code, going on with the debugging.
>
>Simo.

--
www.padl.com | www.lukehoward.com
